00020 #import "NimbusCore/NimbusCore.h"

00025 #import <objc/runtime.h>
00026 
00027 // No-ops for non-retaining objects.
00028 static const void* NIRetainNoOp(CFAllocatorRef allocator, const void *value) { return value; }
00029 static void NIReleaseNoOp(CFAllocatorRef allocator, const void *value) { }
00030 
00031 
00033 NSMutableArray* NICreateNonRetainingArray() {
00034   CFArrayCallBacks callbacks = kCFTypeArrayCallBacks;
00035   callbacks.retain = NIRetainNoOp;
00036   callbacks.release = NIReleaseNoOp;
00037   return (NSMutableArray *)CFArrayCreateMutable(nil, 0, &callbacks);
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00042 NSMutableDictionary* NICreateNonRetainingDictionary() {
00043   CFDictionaryKeyCallBacks keyCallbacks = kCFTypeDictionaryKeyCallBacks;
00044   CFDictionaryValueCallBacks callbacks = kCFTypeDictionaryValueCallBacks;
00045   callbacks.retain = NIRetainNoOp;
00046   callbacks.release = NIReleaseNoOp;
00047   return (NSMutableDictionary *)CFDictionaryCreateMutable(nil, 0, &keyCallbacks, &callbacks);
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00052 NSMutableSet* NICreateNonRetainingSet() {
00053   CFSetCallBacks callbacks = kCFTypeSetCallBacks;
00054   callbacks.retain = NIRetainNoOp;
00055   callbacks.release = NIReleaseNoOp;
00056   return (NSMutableSet *)CFSetCreateMutable(nil, 0, &callbacks);
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00061 BOOL NIIsArrayWithObjects(id object) {
00062   return [object isKindOfClass:[NSArray class]] && [(NSArray*)object count] > 0;
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00067 BOOL NIIsSetWithObjects(id object) {
00068   return [object isKindOfClass:[NSSet class]] && [(NSSet*)object count] > 0;
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00073 BOOL NIIsStringWithAnyText(id object) {
00074   return [object isKindOfClass:[NSString class]] && [(NSString*)object length] > 0;
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00079 void NISwapMethods(Class cls, SEL originalSel, SEL newSel) {
00080   Method originalMethod = class_getInstanceMethod(cls, originalSel);
00081   Method newMethod = class_getInstanceMethod(cls, newSel);
00082   method_exchangeImplementations(originalMethod, newMethod);
00083 }
